Luzbel/Attilla::

When Attilla saw what Galvatron had done, he cursed and quickly flew 
a way his brother before the bomb exploted, Luzbel didn't let go of 
Panzer and bomb damaged slighty his armor; after explotion, Luzbel 
landed in order to check Panzer's status; Attilla landed too, and 
walked some steps and stopped near his brother.

While Luzbel did that, Attilla was on guard and ready to fight; they 
didn't like that Galvatron didnt strike back or any other group of 
bots caught them unawared. 


--- In nbwrpg@y..., aerosmith60@c... wrote:
>  Galvatron stopped. "You know what.....the hell with this. If we 
cant have 
> her no one can." he was right behind the carried cat. He placed a 
bomb righ 
> inside her left leg. He went straight down and it blew after 3 
seconds. he 
> didnt stay to see the damage. he flew off towards the base. he 
looked at 
> Darkmouse."This wa s alost mission. We will have to train in the 
simulation 
> chmaber before next time."
